name: SOBBLE
body:
![Sobble](https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/owlandgiraffe/sobble/720x320.png)

**Control your Sonos system from your Pebble Watch**

Sobble is an application for the Pebble watch, allowing Sonos users to control their Sonos Wireless Speakers from their wrist.

Install it at 

_Sobble has been developed independently and is in no way affiliated with or sponsored by the company Sonos._

## Features
- Change between each Sonos zone
- Skip, play, pause, mute and unmute
- Pause all Sonos zones
- 'Auto-find' Sonos zones (as long as it's connected subnet 192.168.0.*)

## Beta
The application is currently in open beta. Please report any bugs or issues here [https://github.com/owlandgiraffe/Sobble/issues](https://github.com/owlandgiraffe/Sobble/issues)

Crafted by Owl & Giraffe <hello@owlandgiraffe.com>
- [owlandgiraffe.com](http://owlandgiraffe.com)
- [pauljamescampbell.co.uk](http://pauljamescampbell.co.uk)
